body:
Hi.

Currently, I'm working on a new lobby with a few people and I stumbled across an idea that would vastly increase the popularity of Avicus.

Lobby Idea: https://youtu.be/Vi_YlFzXz4gI

I was wondering if command blocks are enabled on Avicus. As shown in the video, you would need command blocks to do this. I could create a bunch of Avicus's social media logos and utilize the idea for additional things such as voting links, Avicus website, Avicus youtube, etc..

If they aren't enabled, I'm asking if they could be enabled for the lobby (maybe all of Avicus?). This would help Avicus in a lot of ways. Thanks for reading.

*Steven told me this might be able to be done with yml?

title: Command blocks in the lobby?

replies.body: I don't think command blocks are enabled.
replies.body_tagged: I don't think command blocks are enabled.

replies.body:
command-blocks=true

btw the kid is so sweet
replies.body_tagged:
command-blocks=true

btw the kid is so sweet

replies.body: Interact flag works in YML for what you want to accomplish I think.
replies.body_tagged: Interact flag works in YML for what you want to accomplish I think.

replies.body: Alright, I'll try collaborate with some Map Devs. Thanks!
replies.body_tagged: Alright, I'll try collaborate with some Map Devs. Thanks!
